---
title: "📜 About _EvidenceSeeker Boilerplate_"
---

_EvidenceSeeker Boilerplate_ is part of the [CompPhil²MMAE](https://compphil2mmae.github.io/) research project "Using Large Language Models to Strengthen Deliberation" (**[KIdeKu](https://compphil2mmae.github.io/research/kideku/)**) at the Karlsruhe Institute of Technology.

## 🏛️ Funding 

KIdeKu is funded by the *Federal Ministry of Education, Family Affairs, Senior Citizens, Women and Youth ([BMBFSFJ](https://www.bmbfsfj.bund.de/bmbfsfj/meta/en))*.

## 🙏 Acknowledgements

## 🛠️ Powered By

- **[LlamaIndex](https://docs.llamaindex.ai/)**: Workflow orchestration and document processing
- **[Gradio](https://gradio.app/)**: Interactive web interface
- **[Pydantic](https://pydantic.dev/)**: Data validation and configuration management
- **[Sentence Transformers](https://www.sbert.net/)**: Document embeddings
- **[Hugging Face](https://huggingface.co/)**: Model hosting and deployment
- **[PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org/)**: Database for vector indices

### 🤝 Collaborations

We presented the project at the [Politechathon Workshop](https://www.wahlexe.de/en/) in December 2024 and received very constructive feedback.
